historical:
Omission of text

The provisions of former ยง 4-101 have been omitted as obsolete, the Boards referred to herein having been abolished. The former Board of Charities, Board of Children's Guardians, and the Board of Trustees of the National Training School for Girls were abolished upon the appointment and organization of the Board of Public Welfare pursuant to the Act of March 16, 1926, 44 Stat. 208, ch. 58, ยง 1. The Board of Public Welfare was subsequently abolished. See notes to ยง 4-102.

DC CODE ยง 4-101

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Board of Charities, Board of Children's Guardians, and National Training School for Girls abolished. [Omitted]
